portfolio.description: A Masjid finder that will look up your current coordinates and locate 25 nearests Masjids in the area. Also built in is the prayer times ang sunrise for that area.
Mobile App Built to simplify job search and application process.
Web and mobile App Built to simplify job search and application process.
A New York Times Hackathon project. Built a game algorithm for NYT that takes in articles from NYT API and outputs a quiz based on that article.
E-commerce website that includes all aspects of shopping online; include shopping by category, checkout with Stripe, a recommendation engine, and fully built shopping cart.
